alert.note: Alert for Haskell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 24 at 5:00PM CDT until October 24 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR HASKELL AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 500 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Weinert to near Funston, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Weinert around 505 PM CDT. Lueders around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Us- 277 Near The Haskell- Knox County Line, Funston and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
